sentences.chinese: 十二大餘四十，小餘九百二十；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder forty, small remainder nine hundred twenty;

sentences.chinese: 大餘四十八，小餘二十四；
sentences.literal: Large remainder forty eight, small remainder twenty four;
Zhu Li Zuo E Huang Long first year.

sentences.chinese: 閏十三大餘三十五，小餘三百二十八；
sentences.literal: Intercalary thirteen large remainder thirty five, small remainder three hundred twenty eight;
Large remainder fifty four, no small remainder;
Shang Heng Yan Mao Chu Yuan first year.

sentences.chinese: 正東十二大餘五十九，小餘二百三十五；
sentences.literal: East twelve large remainder fifty nine, small remainder two hundred thirty five;
Large remainder fifty nine, small remainder eight;
Zhao Yang Da Yuan Xian second year.

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘五十三，小餘五百八十三；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder fifty three, small remainder five hundred eighty three;
Large remainder four, small remainder sixteen;
Heng Ai Kun Dun third year.

sentences.chinese: 閏十三大餘四十七，小餘九百三十一；
sentences.literal: Intercalary thirteen large remainder forty seven, small remainder nine hundred thirty one;
Large remainder nine, small remainder twenty four;
Shang Zhang Chi Fen Ruo fourth year.
